title: Studio apt available in Private Home North East Yonkers
posting_body: ['(North Eastern Yonkers, New York)', '1BR / 1Ba available now', 'Hi!', 'Welcome to your new home!', 'We have a LOVELY basement apt available near Lockwood Ave & Mile Square Road.', 'This apt is available to move in SEPTEMBER 1st!', 'TWO FULL SIZE WINDOWS TO RECEIVE FULL SUNLIGHT IN THIS APT!', 'No flooding, beautiful space.', 'Cool in the summer and warm in the winter b/c of well done insulation and naturally being cooler closer to the ground.', '~ Basement apt in PRIVATE home.', '~ Kitchenette, nice size L.R.', 'FULL BATH w/ bath tub,', 'LARGE Bdrm.', 'Good closet space in Bedroom.', '~ UTILITIES & GAS INCLUDED*', '~ PLENTY of street parking.', 'Sorry, no pets at this time.', '~ Near to Laundromat, restaurants and super market 2 blocks near by.', '~ Bronxville METRO north TRAIN less than 10 minutes by car/uber/lyft etc.', '1st month + security will hold this apt.', 'Laundering on premise unavailable at this time.', '***Credit check and paystubs are required.', '**', 'Please reach out to me, Eugene, with interest through email or call me me @ 914-473-3743 with ANY questions.', 'TEXTING IS FINE.', 'THANKS and have a wonderful day!']
